**IonQ (IONQ)**
*   **December 23, 2025:** IonQ finalized an agreement with KISTI to deliver a 100-qubit quantum system in South Korea.

IonQ also achieved a world-record 99.99% two-qubit gate performance and met its 2025 technical milestone of #AQ 64 on IonQ Tempo three months ahead of schedule.
